text: "Love Bites" is a 1988 song by English heavy metal band Def Leppard and is the sixth single from their fourth studio album Hysteria. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in New Zealand, number 3 in Canada, number 7 in Ireland, number 23 in the Netherlands and number 21 in Australia. ==Track listings== "Billy's Got a Gun" was recorded at Tilburg, Netherlands, in 1987.notes on record label 7-inch: Bludgeon Riffola / Vertigo / Polygram / 830 675-1 (US) # "Love Bites" # "Billy's Got a Gun" (live) 12-inch and CD: Bludgeon Riffola / Vertigo / Polygram (US, UK) # "Love Bites" # "Billy's Got a Gun" (live) # "Excitable" (Orgasmic mix) ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Def Leppard songs
